records.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
records.author: Martin Luther King Jnr

records.quote: Use what youâ€™ve been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!

records.quote: To succeed, you have to do something and be very bad at it for a while. You have to look bad before you can look really good.
records.author: Barbara DeAngelis

records.quote: The greatest glory is not in never falling
records.author: Bayo Ojo

records.quote: Be bold, and mighty forces will come to your aid
records.author: Norman Vincent Peale
